## About Lightroom
Adobe Lightroom stands as the industry-standard solution for photographers seeking a comprehensive workflow application. It seamlessly integrates image organization with powerful editing capabilities in one streamlined package. The application is built to handle large libraries of photos while providing precise control over every aspect of the editing process, from basic exposure adjustments to complex color grading.

This desktop version delivers the complete Lightroom experience, fully optimized for macOS and Windows operating systems. It supports a wide array of file formats, offers exceptional performance for batch processing, and includes advanced features like perspective correction and cloud synchronization, making it an essential tool for both amateur and professional photographers.

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

**For macOS:**
*   macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
*   64-bit multicore processor
*   8 GB RAM (16 GB recommended)
*   4 GB of available storage space

**For Windows:**
*   Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
*   8 GB RAM (16 GB recommended)
*   DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
*   4 GB of available storage space
